CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Closed Won"),"Won", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"CR"),"Won", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"CV"),"Won", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Confirmed Project 100%"),"Won", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Needs Analysis"),"Open", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Meeting Scheduled"),"Open", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Resource Allocation"),"Open", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Present Proposal/RFP Response"),"Open", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Proposal/Price"),"Open", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Objectives Resolved/Questions Answered"),"Open", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Verbal Agreement"),"Open", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Negotiation/Review"),"Open", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Contract & Transition to Accnt Team"),"Open", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"SL1"),"Open", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"SL2"),"Open", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"SL3"),"Open", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"SL4"),"Open", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"PO"),"Open", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"PS"),"Open", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"TS"),"Open", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Sales Goal"),"Sales Goal", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Closed Lost"),"Lost", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"LO"),"Lost", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"LR"),"Lost", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"LP"),"Lost", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"LPM"),"Lost", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"LPE"),"Lost", "Nothing")))))))))))))))))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Opportunity Type
